import string
s = raw_input().split()
l = len(s)
for i in range(l):
    s[i] = string.lower(s[i])
while True:
    p = raw_input().split()
    l1 = len(p)
    a = 1
    for i in range(l1):
        if string.lower(p[i]) not in s:
            a = 0
            break
    if a:
        break
    else:
        print "No"
print "Yes"
